name: Curried Beluga Lentil Pebble Bean Salad
description: The curry and yogurt combination in the salad gives it a refreshing yet intense flavor.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl combine the beans, black lentils, red onion, and celery.

recipeInstructions.text: To make the curry vinaigrette: in a small bowl whisk together the garlic, curry powder, fresh ginger, lemon juice, yogurt, and olive oil. Set aside.
